com.microsoft.azure.documentdb

Class PartitionKeyDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.JsonSerializable
      • com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.PartitionKeyDefinition

  • public final class PartitionKeyDefinition
extends JsonSerializable
    Represents a partition key definition. A partition key definition specifies which document property is used as the partition key in a collection that has multiple partitions.
